channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Why did Bitcoin drop? Analysts point to 5 potential reasons
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Bitcoin's price fell approximately 8% in a span of 10 minutes, leaving crypto investors scrambling to make sense of the drop.

item.title: SEC seeks to question Terraform Labs co-founder Daniel Shin in Korea
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The SEC seeks to question Daniel Shin on Do Kwon and Chai Corporation’s relationship with Terraform Labs.

item.title: Real reason for China’s war on crypto, 3AC judge’s embarrassing mistake: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Sources reveal the real reason China is ramping up efforts to stamp out Bitcoin and crypto. And a year’s worth of 3AC court orders nixed.

item.title: Ethereum surges 11% after report SEC is set to approve Futures ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The United States Securities and Exchange Commission isn't likely to block the debut of Ethereum futures ETFs, according to sources.

item.title: Bitcoin price briefly dips below $26K, falling to two-month lows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The price of Bitcoin fell around 8% in just 10 minutes on Aug. 17, down to levels not seen since June 20.

item.title: Ripple, ConsenSys participate in Mastercard program to promote CBDC innovation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The payment processor has enlisted a range of market players in its quest for innovation and efficiencies in a technology that 93% of central banks are investigating.

item.title: Tornado Cash lawsuit judge sides with US Treasury in motions for summary judgment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Competing motions for summary judgment saw a federal judge rule the U.S. Treasury was within its authority to declare Tornado Cash a sanctioned entity.

item.title: Shibarium denies bridge issues, calls it FUD
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Shytoshi Kusama, co-founder of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, blamed a massive influx of transactions and user activity for technical difficulties on Shibarium.

item.title: Tether discontinues Bitcoin stablecoin, citing lack of usage
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Tether (USDT) stablecoin will no longer be issued on the Bitcoin Omni Layer, while redemptions will still be open for at least a year.

item.title: Tragedy or rug pull? Inside the collapse of a ‘charitable’ NFT project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Orica NFT’s charity efforts have succeeded, but its tokenholders have not, and up until now, its co-founder was nowhere to be found.

item.title: SpaceX wrote down $373M worth of Bitcoin acquired in 2021-2022: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Elon Musk announced in 2021 that SpaceX had some Bitcoin holdings following an SEC filing showing Tesla planned to purchase $1.5 billion worth of the cryptocurrency.

item.title: UK crypto businesses to comply with FATF Travel Rule beginning in September
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The U.K. passed legislation in 2022 to make it one of the few countries in compliance with the extension of the Travel Rule to crypto.

item.title: Bitcoin price breaks from range with drop below $28K, and options tilt toward BTC bears
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: About $570 million in weekly BTC options expire on Friday, and the recent macro and crypto news events have further tilted the advantage to bearish traders.

item.title: Federal Reserve issues enforcement action against FTX-linked US bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Moonstone Bank, which renamed itself Farmington State Bank, received roughly $11.5 million from FTX’s sister firm, Alameda Research, through its holding company in 2022.

item.title: 2024 could be very bullish for crypto — Here’s why
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian J. Permal
item.description: This week’s episode of Market Talks discusses why 2024 could be bullish for the crypto industry and if crypto has weathered the storm.

item.title: Judge grants SEC request to file motion for appeal in Ripple case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The SEC has until Aug. 18 to officially file its motion, and the defendants will have until Sept. 1 to respond.

item.title: Breaking: Coinbase to suspend USDT trading for Canadian users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Users will still be able to deposit and withdraw USDT, DAI and RAI after the deadline, but trading will be suspended.

item.title: Why is XRP price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.category: why is XRP price down today
item.description: XRP price is down today, like other top crypto assets, as traders digest the most recent comments from the Federal Reserve.

item.title: BlockFi opens crypto withdrawals for eligible US users following court order
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The lending platform halted client withdrawals amid filing for bankruptcy in November 2022 but later petitioned the court for authorization to return user funds.

item.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The crypto market is down today as the benchmark U.S. Treasury yield rallied to its highest level in nearly two years.

item.title: Ethereum is a ‘dumpster fire' — Charles Hoskinson
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Despite assurances, discrepancies between Cardano’s theoretical network capacity and its utility remain.

item.title: Fuse CEO Mark Smargon says blockchain payments apps will rival Visa, not Ethereum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: Mark Smargon, CEO of Fuse, explains how blockchain-powered payments can fix the “broken traditional payment system.”

item.title: Bitcoin support levels to watch as BTC price aims at $28K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price still has "heavy support" at the $28,000 mark, with confidence still in place that Bitcoin can avoid a deeper retracement.

item.title: Tether CTO Paolo Ardoino says Bitcoin mining needs better analytical tools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Stablecoin operator Tether is building specialized Bitcoin mining software aimed at using data analytics to optimize mining operations and boost production, CTO Paolo Ardoino says.

item.title: FTX seeks $175M settlement with Genesis entities to resolve dispute
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: However, FTX creditors expressed discontent and urged the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors of FTX to contest the agreement.

item.title: Web3 Gamer: Crypto games need viral moment, Nitro Nation review, Axie’s project Greenlight
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Erhan Kahraman
item.description: Blockchain games desperately need a viral moment to succeed, Cut The Rope in The Sandbox, Axie and Aelph hand out cash, Nitro Nation hot take.

item.title: Colombia central bank recommends limiting CBDC holdings and spending
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Setting limits on CBDC transactions could be beneficial to issues related to user privacy and security, according to the central bank of Colombia.

item.title: BitExchange enables XRP options trading, no need for ownership
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Profit and loss settlement will occur in U.S. dollars, with OrBit Markets responsible for order book liquidity.

item.title: Bitcoin and Ether now less volatile than oil: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Technical analysts suggest that months of low volatility is often followed by a big price move.

item.title: PayPal’s stablecoin opens door for crypto adoption in traditional finance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: PayPal’s stablecoin sparked conversations over traditional finance’s growing interaction with the crypto space, stablecoin regulations and more.
